title: LLVM ERROR: Broken function
body:
This is  the output I get when I run the video2x

`2022-07-06 23:39:15.244 | INFO     | video2x.video2x.video2x:_get_video_info:143 - Reading input video information
23:39:15.438983 | INFO     | Starting video decoder

tbn, 25 tbc (default)

    video2x.upscale(

    -> <video2x.video2x.video2x.Video2X object at 0x7efe913acc10>
